docs.lead_paragraph: Until last week the American public had never heard of M and B 693. But the medicos had. All last year the British medical journals were reporting dramatic successes in treating with this new wonder chemical the complex of thirty-two diseases that we call pneumonia.

headline.main: The Week in Science; Pneumonia Yields

docs.abstract: Comment on San Juan Tropical Med School monkey farm
